com.paydiant.android.core.facade

Class TransactionFlowManagerFacade

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.paydiant.android.core.facade.SDKLoggingProvider
      • com.paydiant.android.core.facade.TransactionFlowManagerFacade
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ITransactionFlowManagerFacade

    public class TransactionFlowManagerFacade
extends SDKLoggingProvider
implements ITransactionFlowManagerFacade
    Provides the implementations for the transaction flow operations defined in the ITransactionFlowManagerFacade .
    Since:
    3.8.0.1
    Author:
    Paydiant
    See Also:
    ITransactionFlowManagerFacade, ITransactionFlowManagerService, TransactionFlowManagerService

    • Method Detail

      • retrieveTransactionMetaData

        @Deprecated
public TransactionMetaDataResponse retrieveTransactionMetaData(TransactionMetaDataParameters transactionMetaDataParameters)
        Deprecated. 
        Description copied from interface: ITransactionFlowManagerFacade
        Retrieves meta-data information related to a transaction. The information required to submit along with the transactionMetaDataParameters parameter and the returned TransactionMetaDataResponse properties will vary according to the processing rules. For example during a "discovery" processing rule, the TransactionMetaDataParameters would require to provide the checkoutToken value and the returned TransactionMetaDataResponse would contain the information related to the checkoutToken along with the next processing rule. Some of the calls to ITransactionFlowManagerFacade.retrieveTransactionMetaData(TransactionMetaDataParameters) might require providing the TransactionMetaDataParameters.setExecutingFlowRule(com.paydiant.android.core.enums.transactionflow.TransactionFlowRule). This method provides the provides the polling implementations for eligible flow rules. (i.e.; Flow rules with TransactionFlowRuleSpecification.isExecuteRuleAndPollForResult() value is set to true).
        Specified by:
        retrieveTransactionMetaData in interface ITransactionFlowManagerFacade
        Parameters:
        transactionMetaDataParameters - transaction meta data parameters containing checkout token value, paydiant reference id, receipt/offer search parameters along with the current execution rule. These parameter properties would be mandatory or optional depending on the next execution rule.
        Returns:
        meta data information related to the provided transaction meta data parameters.

      • retrieveTransactionMetaDataWithoutPolling

        public TransactionMetaDataResponse retrieveTransactionMetaDataWithoutPolling(TransactionMetaDataParameters transactionMetaDataParameters)
        Description copied from interface: ITransactionFlowManagerFacade
        Retrieves meta-data information related to a transaction. The information required to submit along with the transactionMetaDataParameters parameter and the returned TransactionMetaDataResponse properties will vary according to the processing rules. For example during a "discovery" processing rule, the TransactionMetaDataParameters would require to provide the checkoutToken value and the returned TransactionMetaDataResponse would contain the information related to the checkoutToken along with the next processing rule. Some of the calls to ITransactionFlowManagerFacade.retrieveTransactionMetaData(TransactionMetaDataParameters) might require providing the TransactionMetaDataParameters.setExecutingFlowRule(com.paydiant.android.core.enums.transactionflow.TransactionFlowRule). This method does not perform polling like the ITransactionFlowManagerFacade.retrieveTransactionMetaData(TransactionMetaDataParameters) method, and app developers are required to implement the necessary polling mechanisms for eligible flow rules.
        Specified by:
        retrieveTransactionMetaDataWithoutPolling in interface ITransactionFlowManagerFacade
        Parameters:
        transactionMetaDataParameters - transaction meta data parameters containing checkout token value, paydiant reference id, receipt/offer search parameters along with the current execution rule. These parameter properties would be mandatory or optional depending on the next execution rule.
        Returns:
        meta data information related to the provided transaction meta data parameters.

      • updateTransaction

        public TransactionResponse updateTransaction(TransactionParameters transactionParameters)
        Description copied from interface: ITransactionFlowManagerFacade
        Updates the current transaction with the required offer information, payment tender information, tip amounts, cash back/cash access information, transaction confirmation etc.. The information provided will vary according to the processing rules. (E.g.: "submit offers" processing rule will require any selected offers for a given transaction and "submit offers and payment tenders" rule would need to provide both selected offers and the payment instrument.
        Specified by:
        updateTransaction in interface ITransactionFlowManagerFacade
        Parameters:
        transactionParameters - the transaction parameters containing offers, payment tender information, tip amounts, cash back/cash access information, transaction confirmation etc.. required for the next processing rule.
        Returns:
        the transaction response containing necessary transaction information along with the current/next processing rules.

      • generateAccessCode

        public String generateAccessCode(int length)
        Description copied from interface: ITransactionFlowManagerFacade
        A Utility method use to generate random access code with the specified length of digits.
        Specified by:
        generateAccessCode in interface ITransactionFlowManagerFacade
        Parameters:
        length - - number of digits required for the access code.
        Returns:
        Random access code as String

        public SecurityTokenInfo refreshSecurityToken(TransactionTokenParameters transactionTokenParameters)
        Description copied from interface: ITransactionFlowManagerFacade
        Refreshes the security token info with a new mobile session key (MSK)
        Specified by:
        refreshSecurityToken in interface ITransactionFlowManagerFacade
        Parameters:
        transactionTokenParameters - TransactionTokenParameters with the transaction token value
        Returns:
        SecurityTokenInfo with new MSK
        See Also:
        ITransactionFlowManagerService.refreshSecurityToken(TransactionTokenParameters)
